topic.title: Place Your Java Class in Your Web Application

dd.p: The final step is to regenerate the Java class, and place it in your web application for use.
You can use the environment of your choice to generate a java class from your java file.

body.dt: To place your class in your web application

dd.p: Follow the procedure below to place your Java class in your web application.

stentry.StepText: Copy your newly generated Java class.

stentry.draft-comment: Your Java class is now read by the my_webappweb application.

stentry.msgph: For information on creating a web application from scratch, see Getting Started with MIS Smart Publishing.
